attributes.action: provide better treatment for our armed forces personell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
after serving our country  in war zones , risking their lives to protect our country, too many of our servicemen and women are just thrown aside with no help whatsoever. they are not helped with housing and often end up on the street, only to be told by the local m.p that if you were an unemployed teenage mother or just coming out of prison we could help you
but as you have only been serving your nation ,sorry no help for you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
